product_name: Eureka Wild Basin Sleeping Bag - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Enjoy camping and backpacking year-round with the synthetic-insulated Eureka Wild Basin Sleeping Bag. ThermaShield(TM) insulation is a proprietary blend of solid and hollow core polyester staple fibers; blend provides excellent warmth while maintaining loft and durability. Rated to keep your warm down to about 0degF, making it a good choice for year-round backpacking trips. Warm-to-touch, peached polyester lining combines the performance value of a synthetic fabric with the soft feel of cotton; slightly fuzzy texture adds warmth and comfort. Durable zipper with anti-snag webbing ensures smooth, trouble-free operation. The anatomically designed trapezoidal footbox lets your feet rest in their natural position. Insulated draft tube runs the entire length of the zipper to seal in warmth. Draft collar has an extra baffle of insulation that fits comfortably around your torso, providing a barrier against cold air infiltration. Includes a fleece-lined pillow pocket. Eureka Wild Basin Sleeping Bag comes with a compression stuff sack. Overstock.
short_description: Enjoy camping and backpacking year-round with the synthetic-insulated Eureka Wild Basin Sleeping Bag.
